delicious and fun to give away as a gift
this holiday season I have a really good
idea for you how about a pear apple
butter made in your slow cooker a
delicious holiday gift for friends and
family start off by peeling five pounds
of fruit this is half pears half apples
so do a half pounds of each we prefer
McIntosh or Gala apples and then
Bartlett or Anjou pear because they're
nice and soft and they'll cook down you
also have the added benefit if you make
this recipe of getting to smell the
deliciousness all day long
